title: The Kommandant's Mistress
description: The relationship between the Kommandant of a Nazi concentration camp and the Jewish woman inmate whom he forces to become his "mistress," is revealed from the perspectives of both protagonists, as well as from ostensibly objective biographical encyclopedia entries on each. 2nd edition (includes translations of Verdi's opera La Traviata) . Arcade (Trade Paper) 2000.
author: Sherri Szeman
